45 template <class PointInType>
46 void nimbus::cloudFilter<PointInType>::voxelGrid(const PointCloudType blob, PointCloudType &res)
47 {
48  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>::Ptr temp (new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointXYZI>());
49  pcl::copyPointCloud(blob, *temp);
50  pcl::VoxelGrid<pcl::PointXYZI> vox;
51  vox.setInputCloud(temp);
52  vox.setLeafSize(0.01f, 0.01f, 0.01f);
53  vox.filter(res);
54 }
